name: onshape-desktop-shell
description: Onshape desktop app (web application shell). Unofficial.

scripts.prepare: npm run compile && cp package.json out/package.json && cd out && npm install --production && cd ..
scripts.build:osx: npm run clean:osx && npm run prepare && electron-packager out "Onshape" --out=dist --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --version=0.36.0 --icon=build/icon.icns --asar=true --app-category-type=public.app-category.graphics-design && codesign --deep --force --verbose --sign 'Vladimir Krivosheev' dist/Onshape-darwin-x64/Onshape.app
scripts.build:win: npm run clean:win && npm run prepare && electron-packager out "Onshape" --out=dist/win --platform=win32 --arch=all --version=0.36.0 --icon=build/icon.ico --asar=true
scripts.build: npm run build:osx && npm run build:win
scripts.pack:win: npm run build:win && npm run pack:win64 && mv 'dist/win/Onshape Setup.exe' 'dist/win/Onshape Setup x64.exe' && npm run pack:win32
scripts.pack: npm run pack:osx && npm run pack:win
